text: 2:4-5 Luk 15:24; 15:32; Aposel 15:11; Rom 5:6-10; 10:12; Efesus 1:7; 2:7Guizbangɨra, en arazir kuraba e gamizɨ en duaba guizbangɨra aremezɨ moghɨn iti, mati gumazamizir ariaghireziba. Ezɨ God bar e gifongezɨ, an apangkuvir dafam bar e avara. Kamaghɨn an e gamizɨ e Krais ko angamɨra iti. Ezɨ God uan apangkuvimɨn tuavimra, a en akura.
